import React from "react" import Comment from "./Comment.js" import IssueList from "./IssuesList.js" function Issue(props) { console.log(props) const commentList = props.comments.map(item => ) return (

{props.title}

{props.user === props.author ? : ""}
Posted by {props.user}

{props.description}

Upvotes: {props.upVotes.length}

Downvotes: {props.downVotes.length}

{commentList}
) } export default Issue
